indications: benzonatate capsules usp indicated symptomatic relief cough .
contraindications: adults children 10 years age : usual dose one 100 mg 200 mg capsule three times day needed cough . necessary control cough , 600 mg daily three divided doses may given . benzonatate capsules usp swallowed whole . benzonatate capsules usp broken , chewed , dissolved , cut crushed .
warningsAndPrecautions: benzonatate capsules usp , 100 mg available yellow colored , oval shaped soft gelatin capsules , imprinted '705 ' white ink containing clear , pale yellow viscous liquid . ndc 64380-712-06 bottles 100 capsules . ndc 64380-712-07 bottles 500 capsules . benzonatate capsules usp , 200 mg available yellow colored , oval shaped soft gelatin capsules , imprinted '704 ' white ink containing clear , pale yellow viscous liquid . ndc 64380-713-06 bottles 100 capsules . ndc 64380-713-07 bottles 500 capsules . store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15-30°c ( 59-86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect light dispense tight ( usp ) , child-resistant containers .
indications_original: Benzonatate capsules USP are indicated for the symptomatic relief of cough.
contraindications_original: Adults and Children over 10 years of age: Usual dose is one 100 mg or 200 mg capsule three times a day as needed for cough. If necessary to control cough, up to 600 mg daily in three divided doses may be given. Benzonatate capsules USP should be swallowed whole. Benzonatate capsules USP are not to be broken, chewed, dissolved, cut or crushed.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Benzonatate capsules USP, 100 mg are available as yellow colored, oval shaped soft gelatin capsules, imprinted as '705' in white ink and containing clear, pale yellow viscous liquid. 
                  NDC 64380-712-06 in bottles of 100 capsules.
                  NDC 64380-712-07 in bottles of 500 capsules.
                  
                     Benzonatate capsules USP, 200 mg are available as yellow colored, oval shaped soft gelatin capsules, imprinted as '704' in white ink and containing clear, pale yellow viscous liquid.
                  NDC 64380-713-06 in bottles of 100 capsules.
                  NDC 64380-713-07 in bottles of 500 capsules.
                  
                     Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F); excursions permitted to 15-30°C (59-86°F) [See USP controlled room temperature]. 
                  
                  
                     PROTECT FROM LIGHT
                  
                  Dispense in a tight (USP), child-resistant containers.
adverseReactions_original: Hypersensitivity to benzonatate or related compounds.
